Konstantin, is there any more info in the log file?  The stack trace is from an
exception wrapper that was wrapping another exception.  The log should contain
the nested exception stack trace after a line like "*** Stack trace of contained
exception ***".  Do you see this in your log?  Please attach log file if still
available.

Sorry, I saw it only once and I clear error log fairly often.
I will post stack trace, if it will appear again.

Closing.  Not enough information to investigate. Please reopen if it re-occurs
and attach the complete log.
